001package src.pkg_commands;
002import src.pkg_models.Player;
003import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
004import src.pkg_items.ItemList;
005import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
006import java.util.Set;
007/**
008 * Command allowing the player to consume a specific item, 
009 * adjusting their weight depending on the item consumed.
010 *
011 * @author Pierre MATAR
012 */
013public class EatCommand extends Command
014{
015    /**
016     * Executes the "Eat" command by consuming an item from the current room 
017     * or player's inventory and adjusting weight accordingly.
018     *
019     * @param pPlayer      the player executing the command.
020     * @param pGameEngine  the game engine managing interactions.
021     */
022    
023    @Override
024    public void execute(final Player pPlayer, final GameEngine pGameEngine) {
025        
026        if (!super.hasSecondWord()) {
027            pGameEngine.getGui().println("eat what ?");
028            return;
029        }
030        
031        String vItemName = super.getSecondWord();
032        Room vCurrentRoom = pPlayer.getCurrentRoom();
033        if (pGameEngine.getItemsToEat().getItem(vItemName) != null) {
034               if (vCurrentRoom.getItem(vItemName) != null ) {
035            
036                    if (vCurrentRoom.getItem(vItemName) == pGameEngine.getMagicCookie()) pPlayer.setPlayerWeight(pPlayer.getPlayerWeight());
037                    else pPlayer.setPlayerWeight(vCurrentRoom.getItem(vItemName).getItemWeight());
038                      
039                    vCurrentRoom.removeItem(vItemName);
040                    pGameEngine.getGui().println("Miam miam miammmmm, here is your weigth now : " + pPlayer.getPlayerWeight());
041                }
042        else if (pPlayer.getItem(vItemName) != null) {
043                if (pPlayer.getItem(vItemName) == pGameEngine.getMagicCookie()) pPlayer.setPlayerWeight(pPlayer.getPlayerWeight());
044                else pPlayer.setPlayerWeight(pPlayer.getItem(vItemName).getItemWeight());
045                
046                pPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
047                pGameEngine.getGui().println("Miam miam miammmmm, here is your weigth now : " + pPlayer.getPlayerWeight());
048            }
049        else pGameEngine.getGui().println(vItemName + " is not here and you don't own it...");
050        }
051        else pGameEngine.getGui().println(pGameEngine.getItemsToEat().getAllItemString(this));
052    
053    }
054}
